__e: Those shrooms you made me take are making me sick to my stomach.
- I've been eating that mushroom soup you told me to do, but before that, - meat and potatoes, mostly.
I promised the missus I'd get her some of those shrooms she loves.
Eh-eh, eh-eh. This little guy doesn't know which wish is which, because his brain is filled with fungus and bacterias.
When you start with the antibiotics then comes the stomach, the mouth, which sometimes gets these things around the... like fungus, stuff like that...
Well, apparently, he ate some awful mushrooms and spoke to a tree for three days.
Exactly what kind of mushrooms are they?
These 'shrooms are really fucking kicking in.
The fungus is all up inside him, too.
